name: Devastation Cannon
for weapon tooltip>>: A Devastator Cannon modified to fire much larger shells at a slower rate.  Poorly balanced.

name: Autopulse Beam
for weapon tooltip>>: Similar to the Autopulse Laser, but fires a beam.  Is the reason this mod exists.

name: Thermal Pulse Beam Cannon
for weapon tooltip>>: Highly modified Thermal Pulse Cannon that discharges the entire capacitor at once to produce a continuous beam.

name: Plasma Beam
for weapon tooltip>>: Similar to the Plasma Cannon, but fires a beam.

name: Tachyon Accelerator
for weapon tooltip>>: Modified Tachyon Lance, fires a projectile instead of a continuous beam.  Unable to pierce shields, but has a powerful disabling effect.
customPrimary: Hits on hull or armor arc to weapons and engines, dealing extra EMP and  minor energy damage.

name: Light Mjolnir Cannon

for weapon tooltip>>: Single barrel Mjolnir Cannon.  Slightly worse flux efficiency.

name: Harpoon MRM Launcher
for weapon tooltip>>: Single rail launcher for the ubiquitous Harpoon MRM.  Large magazines built into the hull ensure slow but reliable firepower in long engagements.

name: Heavy Positron Cannon
for weapon tooltip>>: Heavy gun firing positron blasts. Long range, high velocity, low flux efficiency.
